colour¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
pair¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

pair_id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

graphs.views module¶

class graphs.views.AnnotationView(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: egenie.views.RotatingView

Displays sensor readings from all electricity readings as line graphs, and lets users add annotations by selecting ranges of the graphs.

get_back_url()[source]¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)[source]¶
template_name = 'graphs/annotation.html'¶
graphs.views.get_devices(request, pk)[source]¶

JSON data for the annotation view, including annotations, and pairs of sensors (sensor name and channel).
